events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on April 28th involving a collision with another vehicle.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident category based on the description of the vehicle collision.
An agent was assigned to the auto accident claim to facilitate faster processing and customer support.
The customer received official acknowledgment of the claim submission and detailed next steps.
Requested all supporting documents including photos of the car damage, police report, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted all requested documents fully including photos of the vehicle, police report, and repair bills.
Investigation started to verify details of the collision and assess liability based on submitted evidence.
The investigation concluded that the insured driver was not at fault and damages are covered under the policy.
A settlement offer was proposed covering full repair costs and rental car reimbursement for the claim.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the handling of the claim and the proposed settlement offer.
The claim was officially approved to proceed with payment and repairs as per settlement agreement.
Payment for the approved claim was issued promptly to the nominated repair shop and the customer.
The auto accident claim was closed successfully after confirmation that all repairs have been completed.
